aria-team-members-dialog-rmmember-title: Een zorgverlener uit het team {{teamName}} verwijderen
aria-team-members-dialog-rmmember-questi: Weet je zeker dat je {{hcpFirstName}} {{hcpLastName}} uit dit behandelteam wilt verwijderen?
aria-team-leave-dialog-question: Weet je zeker dat je het behandelteam {{teamName}} wilt verlaten?
cookie-content: We gebruiken cookies om je ervaring met onze app te verbeteren. Cookies van derden stellen je in staat te profiteren van ondersteuningsfuncties zoals onze widget en ons contactformulier en helpen ons te begrijpen hoe de app wordt gebruikt. Lees meer en update je voorkeuren op elk willekeurig moment door ons Cookiebeleid te bezoeken. Accepteer je deze cookies?
error-http-500: Er is iets fout gegaan. Probeer het over enkele ogenblikken opnieuw. Neem contact op met support voor hulp als het probleem zich blijft voordoen
error-http-40x: Er is een fout opgetreden. Neem contact op metsupport voor hulp
team-leave-dialog-and-del-title: Leave and delete a care team
team-leave-dialog-only-admin-consequence: Since you are the only team's administrator, you need to give administrator permission to another member before leaving.
team-leave-dialog-question: Are you sure you want to leave this care team?
team-leave-dialog-and-del-question: Since you are the only member in this team, {{teamName}} will be permanently deleted if you leave it.
team-leave-dialog-consequences: You will no longer have access to your patients data.
team-leave-dialog-and-del-consequences: You will no longer have access to your patients data. This action can't be undone.
team-modal-create-info: This information will be displayed along your name when you invite a new patient or a team member. They will review this information to verify your identity. Please make sure it is accurate.
team-modal-create-warning: By creating this care team, your account will become its administrator by default. You can invite other healthcare professionals and manage user permissions at anytime.
team-modal-create-warning-2: By accepting our {{terms-and-conditions}} you confirm you are a registered healthcare professional in your country and have the right to create a care team.
team-page-failed-edit: Impossible to save team information. Please try again later.
team-page-failed-remove-member: Impossible to remove member. Please try again later.
team-page-failed-update-role: Impossible to change member role. Please try again later.
team-page-failed-leave: Impossible to leave team. Please try again later.
team-page-failed-invite-hcp: Impossible to send invitation. Please try again later.
team-page-success-remove-member: Healthcare professional is no longer part of your care team.
team-page-leave-success: You're no longer a member of the team.
team-page-failure-deleted: Impossible to delete this team. Please retry later.
team-members-dialog-rmmember-title: Remove a healthcare professional from the team {{teamName}}
team-members-dialog-rmmember-question: Are you sure you want to remove {{hcpFirstName}} {{hcpLastName}} from this care team?
team-members-dialog-rmmember-consequence: They will no longer have access to patients data.
team-members-dialog-switch-role-title: Remove myself as a team administrator
team-members-dialog-switch-role-question: Are you sure you want to remove yourself from the administrators?
team-members-dialog-switch-role-conseque: You will no longer be able to:
team-members-dialog-switch-role-success: You’re no longer an administrator of the team.
team-members-dialog-switch-role-failure: Impossible to remove yourself. Please retry later.
signup-consent-patient-privacy-policy: Ik heb de YourLoops {{privacyPolicy}} gelezen en geaccepteerd. Hierbij geef ik toestemming voor het verwerken van mijn persoonlijke gegevens (inclusief mijn gezondheidsgegevens) door Diabeloop zodat ik gebruik kan maken van de diensten van YourLoops.
signup-consent-patient-terms-condition: Ik heb de YourLoops {{terms}} gelezen en geaccepteerd.
signup-consent-caregiver-privacy-policy: Ik heb de YourLoops {{privacyPolicy}} gelezen en geaccepteerd. Hierbij geef ik toestemming voor het verwerken van mijn persoonlijke gegevens door Diabeloop zodat ik gebruik kan maken van de diensten van YourLoops.
signup-consent-caregiver-terms-condition: Ik heb YourLoops {{terms}} gelezen en geaccepteerd. Hierbij verbind ik mij ertoe om YourLoops uitsluitend te gebruiken in overeenstemming met deze gebruiksvoorwaarden en wat wettelijk is toegestaan.
signup-consent-hcp-privacy-policy: Ik heb de YourLoops {{privacyPolicy}} gelezen en geaccepteerd. Hierbij geef ik toestemming voor het verwerken van mijn persoonlijke gegevens door Diabeloop zodat ik gebruik kan maken van de diensten van YourLoops.
signup-consent-hcp-terms-condition: Ik heb de YourLoops {{terms}} gelezen en geaccepteerd. Ik bevestig dat ik een bevoegde zorgverlener ben volgens de lokale wet- en regelgeving. Ik verbind mij ertoe YourLoops uitsluitend te gebruiken in overeenstemming met deze gebruiksvoorwaarden en met wat wettelijk is toegestaan.
signup-radiolabel-hcp-body: Bekijk alle diabetes gegevens van je patiënten op één plaats. Word lid en maak een behandelteam voor je kliniek of praktijk.
signup-radiolabel-caregiver-body: Bekijk de diabetesgegevens van patiënten als een individuele verzorger of familielid.
signup-steppers-ending-message: Volg de link in de e-mail die we je net stuurden op {{email}} om je account te verifiëren en activeren
modal-add-patient-legal-placeholder: By inviting this patient to share their data with me and their care team, I declare under my professional responsibility that I am part of this patient’s care team and, as such, have the right to access the patient’s personal data according to the applicable regulations. Read our Terms of Use and Data Privacy.
modal-team-code-descr-placeholder: Communicate this identification code to your patient during a consultation so they can verify your identity.
modal-team-code-descr-placeholder-2: This identification code is always available in the team information on the “My teams”page.
hcp-account-preferences-title: Update your personal info and preferences
hcp-account-preferences-success: Your preferences have been successfully saved.
hcp-account-preferences-error: Preferences not saved. Please retry later.
modal-add-medical-team-code-info-2: Ask your healthcare provider for their unique identification code.
modal-delete-member: Remove a healthcare professional from the team
modal-delete-member-info: Are you sure you want to remove {{hcpName}} from this care team?
modal-delete-member-failure: Impossible to remove healthcare professional. Please retry later.
modal-delete-patient-info: Are you sure you want to stop monitoring {{patientName}}?
modal-delete-patient-info-2: You and your team members will no longer have access to their data.
modal-delete-patient-success: Patient is no longer monitored by your team
modal-delete-patient-failure: Impossible to remove patient. Please retry later.
modal-patient-share-team-title: Share your data with a care team
modal-patient-share-team-info: Your healthcare professional invites you to share your data with
modal-patient-team-warning: Please verify that the above details match the information provided by your healthcare professional before accepting the invitation.
modal-patient-share-team-privacy: By accepting this invitation, I recognize this team as my care team and consent to share my personal data with all its members, who are authorized healthcare professionals registered on YourLoops. I acknowledge that I can revoke this access at any time.
modal-patient-share-team-failure: Impossible to accept invitation. Please retry later.
modal-patient-add-team-info: You are about to share you data with
modal-patient-add-team-privacy: By adding this team as my care team, I consent to share my personal data with all its members, who are authorized healthcare practitioners registered on YourLoops. I acknowledge that I can revoke this access at any time.
modal-patient-add-team-success: Your care team has now access to your data.
modal-patient-add-team-failure: Impossible to add a care team. Please retry later.
modal-remove-info: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}}?
modal-patient-remove-caregiver-info-2: They will no longer have access to your data.
modal-patient-remove-caregiver-success: Your caregiver has no longer access to your data.
modal-patient-remove-caregiver-failure: Impossible to remove caregiver. Please retry later.
modal-patient-remove-team-info-2: Your healthcare provider and their team will no longer have access to your data and its history.
modal-patient-remove-team-success: Your care team has no longer access to your data.
modal-patient-remove-team-failure: Impossible to remove team. Please retry later.
modal-remove-patient-info-2: You will no longer have access to their data.
modal-remove-patient-success: You no longer have access to this patient data.
modal-switch-hcp-info: You are about to convert your caregiver account to a professional account.
modal-switch-hcp-info-3: As a healthcare professional on YourLoops you can:
modal-switch-hcp-list-1: Create, manage and join care teams
modal-switch-hcp-list-2: Invite your patients to share their data
modal-switch-hcp-info-4: Patients you followed as a caregiver will be added to your Professional Private Care.
modal-switch-hcp-failure: Impossible to switch account. Please retry later.
notif-caregiver-invitation: {patientName} wants to share their diabetes data with you.
datashare: wil zijn/haar diabetesgegevens met je delen.
join-group: nodigt je uit om je aan te sluiten bij
